ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been wandering the alter planes for months now, and I ve never heard of diamond dust dropping. Everyone knows I m looking for it too, so there s not much
ygData.messageBody:
I've been wandering the alter planes for months now,
and I've never heard of diamond dust dropping.
Everyone knows I'm looking for it too, so there's not
much chance that they'd hide it. My guess is that
it's a lvl 50 mob somewhere else, but I have no idea
where 8(

Gazamel Prime
Solusek Ro

--- cerceta@... wrote:
> OK don't get to excited but I have been asked by a
> fellow gnome to make
> the gemcutter. He claims he can get the diamond dust
> for me, but won't
> give up the npc that drops it. He claims that the
> npc is 50th level and
> that the diamond dust is a rare drop item off it. I
> am thinking that this
> could mean that the npc may be in the planes but
> that is merley speculation.
> I wish he would give up the info but he is keeping
> it hidden from all for
> another gnome. Well i hope this gives all you
> tinkerers hope:) Has anyone
> discovered what the formula is for the Thermal
> Cloak? Where can i aquire
> tattered belts? Are they merely patchwork belts or
> are they actually called
> Tattered belts?
>
>
> Grudup PuddleJumperTinkertot.....Tallon Zek *80
> skill*
>
<HR>
<html>
>
